suggestedTasks.title: Add Focus Management Tests for Session Input Component
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive test suite for input focus behavior in session textarea. Verify that focus is maintained after text submission in different scenarios including live streaming and standard input modes. Use testing library to simulate user interactions and validate focus retention.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure consistent user experience and prevent unexpected focus loss

suggestedTasks.title: Document Input Handling Patterns in SessionCard
suggestedTasks.description: Create documentation explaining the input handling strategy for the SessionCard textarea. Include details about focus management, submission logic, and interaction patterns. This will help future developers understand the component's design and prevent regressions.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve code maintainability and knowledge sharing

patterns: Dynamic class management for input states
gotchas: Complex conditional styling can impact performance
